text: Richard Herrera, a.k.a. Rich Herrera, is a television actor/host and former MTV VJ. Herrera along with Richard Hardin, representing the Philippines, won The Amazing Race Asia 4 in 2010. He joined MTV Asia in 2011 as a MTV VJ, hosting Pimp My Ride Malaysia. Herrera along with Hardin provided voiceovers for The Price Is Right on ABS-CBN in 2011. ==Filmography== ===Movies=== {|class="wikitable" |- !Year !Title !Role !Notes !Reference(s) |- | rowspan="1" | 2013|| Chasing Fire || Shane || Philippines ||style="text-align: center;"| |- | rowspan="1" | 2015 || Selfie, The Movie || Detective James||Cambodia, Singapore ||style="text-align: center;"| |- | rowspan="1" | 2017 || Wonder Boy || Ross || Singapore ||style="text-align: center;"| |- |2018||Crazy Rich Asians || || ||style="text-align: center;"| |} ==See also== *The Amazing Race Asia *Pimp My Ride ==References== ==External links== *Pimp My Ride Malaysia: Meet the Team on YouTube * Category:Filipino television presenters Category:Filipino male voice actors Category:The Amazing Race contestants Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people
title: Richard Herrera
